jd: From: Naveen M, Siri Info naveen.m@siriinfo.com Reply to: naveen.m@siriinfo.com Hello,Greetings from Siri InfoSolutions…We have an immediate position, please find the below details… Role name: Product Manager (Retail domain), Product OwnerLocation: Atlanta, GA (Onsite)Duration: 6+ months contract Job Description:• Retail Domaino Have experience working in retail domain and under retail related applications.o Have functional knowledge on store operations and IT applications managing Stores operations. • User centered ideation & discoveryo Customer research to develop empathy, identify critical problems to solve, expectations, behaviors, mental models, decision-making approach, etc.o Business stakeholder interviews to understand operational complexities, strategic objectives and plans, impacts and considerations, etc.o Analysis of quant & qual data (internal and external) to aid in prioritizationo Analysis of competitive landscape, and recommendation for positioning withino Analysis of industry trends and emerging opportunities, and how they are shifting customer expectationso Technology partnership to evaluate technical constraints, complexities, & capabilitieso Financial modeling for ROI analysiso Strategic roadmap development – near & long-term vision that will drive iterative valueo Storytelling & socialization of product – with business & technology stakeholders • User centered scope definition & prioritizationo Use cases, journey mapping, hypothesis developmento Breaking down product vision into a release strategy (slices of scope that allow us to deliver iteratively minimizing tech risk, getting user validation sooner, test & learn, delivering value sooner - for customer and business)o Analysis of quant & qual data (internal and external) to drive alignment around prioritized problems to solve, outcomes to drive, rather than merely a list of featureso Partnering with UX to define IA (information architecture) and CS (content strategy) of new/changing user experienceo Identification of KPIs, engagement & operational metrics for each slice of scope • Stakeholder managemento Navigate complexities of cross-brand/cross-channel/cross-division/cross-functional stakeholder landscape - leveraging expertise and driving alignment & engagement amongst sponsor, business owner(s), working group, and other senior stakeholders.o Interviews, facilitation of working group, 1:1s, group showcase forums, etc. – driving alignment and uncovering operational and organizational impacts, coordinating business readiness activities, considering business process impacts & dependencies, and driving product training & transfer of ownership • Agile product deliveryo Partners with Iteration Manager, Tech Lead, QA, and engineers to continuously improve and maximize output of delivery teamo Effectively builds & prioritizes user stories for each iterative delivery – partnering with UX, tech, QA, business SMEs to deliver eacho Maintains outcome focus by adjusting product roadmap, release strategy, & scope priorities based on realities of an agile environment – constantly uncovering more information in technical, business, customer, and data areas • Product Hind sightingo Partners with analytics team to develop & implement test strategy to validate key hypotheses Thanks & Regards,Naveen Miyyadi | Team Lead | Email: naveen.m@siriinfo.com | Phone : 732-797-9367Siri InfoSolutions Inc, 3 Ethel Rd, Suite # 302, Edison NJ 08817.
